text:
Laki-laki bertudung dengan balutan perban yang menutupi mata tersenyum lebar. Menampilkan deretan gigi putih yang rapi.
"[redacted_name]."
[redacted_name] tak berkedip. Matanya kini menatap tajam ke arah laki-laki yang mengaku bernama [redacted_name]. Merasakan sesuatu yang aneh dari sosok di depannya. Menguar dari dalam tubuh dan menimbulkan aura aneh di sekitar.
"Aku fans beratmu, [redacted_name]."
Senyum [redacted_name] sekarang terlihat seperti seringai. Membuat perasaan tidak nyaman ketika memandang.
"Hm? Terima kasih." ujar [redacted_name] menanggapi singkat. Tak tertarik untuk memperpanjang obrolan dengan [redacted_name]. Perasaan tidak nyaman yang dirasa semakin menjadi-jadi.
Sang gadis putih lalu memalingkan wajah. Kembali menatap puluhan orang di bawah yang masih menikmati pesta. Mata merahnya bergerak liar ke segala arah, mengamati keadaan juga mencari sesuatu yang mencurigakan.
trans:
A man wearing a hood and with bandages covering his eyes smiled broadly, showing a row of neat white teeth.
"[redacted_name]."
[redacted_name] didn't blink. Her eyes now sharply focused on the man who claimed to be named [redacted_name]. He sensed something strange from the figure in front of her. An odd aura emanated from his body, creating a strange atmosphere around them.
"Iâ€™m a huge fan of yours, [redacted_name]."
Now, [redacted_name]'s smile looked more like a grin, making it uncomfortable to look at.
"Hm? Thank you." [redacted_name] replied briefly, uninterested in continuing the conversation with [redacted_name]. The uncomfortable feeling only grew stronger.
The pale girl then turned her face away, once again gazing at the dozens of people below, still enjoying the party. Her red eyes moved restlessly in every direction, scanning the surroundings and searching for anything suspicious.
